text: parayuka: nan ninnaleppealulla oru manusyan matraman. ninnalute daivam ekadaivam matramanenn enikk divyabeadhanam labhikkunnunt. atinal arenkilum tanre nathanumayi kantumuttanamenn agrahikkunnuvenkil avan salkkarmannal ceytukeallatte. tanre nathane valippetunna karyattil areyum pankucerkkatirikkatte
